modName: Dragonscale Armor Texture Recolor -Male and Female-
summary: Dragonscale Light Armor recolored. Multiple colors to choose from.
descriptionHtml:
Install instruction: Just download the files extract them and place the texture folder to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data or C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Uninstall instructions: Just delete it from the same place you installed it.

Let me know if you want different colors. I can play around with the hue and saturation in photoshop to easily and quickly change the colors.
author: Velkan89
